casebody.data:
Stevens, Respondent, v. American Fire Ins. Co. et al., Appellants. (Supreme Court, General Term, Fifth Department. April 13, 1892.) Action, by Holmes B. Stevens against the American Fire Insurance Company and another.

Argued before Dwight, P. .T., and Macomber and Lewis, JJ.

No opinion. Interlocutory judgment appealed from affirmed, with costs, with leave to answer within 20 days on payment of costs of the demurrer and of this appeal.
